title: # 526 - John Crist & ME
itunes:title: # 526 - John Crist & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, John Crist. We talk about growing up Mennonite, getting cancelled for kissing, addiction, rehab, and much more! 

Follow John

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/johnbcrist 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/johnbcrist 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays. Use the code “BERT” for 50% off 2+ pairs of polarized sunglasses at http://www.shadyrays.com

 

This episode is also brought to you by Masterworks. Skip the wait line when you use the code “BERT” at http://www.masterworks.io 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo Zero. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 15% off your first order. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Wine Enthusiast. Go to http://www.wineenthusiast.com or text “BERT” to 511511 for the 4th of July Wine Cellar & Furniture sale.

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
